trivia_items.text: Her name most likely derives from Mastema, a fallen angel mentioned in the Book of Jubilees.
There is a misconception within the Arknights community that Mostima possesses a blue tongue. This likely stems from her Elite 2 artwork, in which a bluish tinge is present inside Mostima's mouth.
In the Arknights community, Mostima's  Key of Chronology has been subjected to meme-ish jokes:
sub_items: In CN, the skill is often nicknamed "True Woman Slash" since its animation is identical to SilverAsh's  Truesilver Slash. This is also the same as SilverAsh's skill as "True Manliness Slash" and MÅ‚ynar's  Unbrilliant Glory as "True Golden Slash."

The release of her Operator Module and its three stages further decrease the enemies' speed into almost 90%. As such, many joke that she is actually wielding the power of The World in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure.
